div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1089 Cherronesus (near mod. Sevastopol'), Crimea oblast, Ukraine, 1904 Burial: c. mid 3rd cent. B.C. Contents: 11 AE Cherronesus: AE (as BMC 6 [7], 7-8 [4], several magistrates) Disposition: Sevastopol' Kostsiushko-Valiuzhinich, IAK 20 (1906), p. 93
